# Don’t give Big Cloud your data

For a fraction of the cost of major cloud providers Lease private HPC machines
to keep your models and data safe and secure

See Our Servers and Pricing

# Private On-Premise Cloud

# at a fraction of the price

| Lambda| CoreWeave| AWS| DLR  
---|---|---|---|---  
GPU| 1xA100 PCIE 40 GB| 1xA100 PCIE 40 GB| 1xA100 PCIE 40 GB| 1xA100 PCIE 40
GB  
Cores| 30| 94| 96| 64  
Storage| 516 GB| 1 TB| 8 TB| 15 TB NVMe  
Dedicated, Low Latency Fiber| No| No| No| Yes  
Personal Customer Service| No| No| No| Yes  
Price (Per Hour)| $1.10| $2.06| $3.80| $1.37  
  
# Servers and Pricing

# NVIDIA A100 40GB PCIE

$7,999 per Month $1,849 per Week $269 per Day

· Total GPU: 8 · Teraflops: 156.0 (Single-Precision) · 2x EPYC 7502 Processor
· 512GB DDR4 3200 Memory · 15.3 TB NVMe Storage

Request

# NVIDIA A100 40GB PCIE

$3,999 per Month $929 per Week $139 per Day

· Total GPU: 4 · Teraflops: 78.0 (Single-Precision) · EPYC 7B13 Processor ·
512GB DDR4 Memory · 2 TB NVMe Storage

Request

# NVIDIA V100

$349 per Month $81 per Week $12 per Day

· Total GPU: 1 · Teraflops: 13.2 (Single-Precision) · E5-2670 Processor · 64GB
DDR3 Memory · 500 GB SSD + 2.5 TB Raid0 Storage

Request

# NVIDIA A40

$1,499 per Month $349 per Week $49 per Day

· Total GPU: 4 · Teraflops: 149.6 (Single-Precision) · EPYC 7B11 Processor ·
256GB DDR4 3200 Memory · 2 TB NVMe U.2 Storage

Request

# NVIDIA RTX 3090 (7282)

$849 per Month $199 per Week $29 per Day

· Total GPU: 2 · Teraflops: 58.56 (Single-Precision) · EPYC 7282 Processor ·
128GB DDR4 3200 Memory · 2 TB NVMe M.2 Storage

Request

# NVIDIA RTX 3090 (7302)

$849 per Month $199 per Week $29 per Day

· Total GPU: 2 · Teraflops: 58.56 (Single-Precision) · EPYC 7302P Processor ·
128GB DDR4 3200 Memory · 2 TB NVMe M.2 Storage

Request

# NVIDIA RTX 3090 (7502)

$1,699 per Month $399 per Week $59 per Day

· Total GPU: 4 · Teraflops: 117.1 (Single-Precision) · EPYC 7502 Processor ·
256GB DDR4 3200 Memory · 2 TB NVMe M.2 Storage

Request

# About Us

Loading...

# Meet the Team

### Jonathan Hatch

Co-Founder and CEO Jonathan serves as CEO and CTO of Deep Learning Rental.
When not working on technology projects, you can find him spending time with
his family.

### David Kaplan

Co-Founder and COO David manages the business side of Deep Learning Rental and
keeps the trains running on time. When not reminding Jonathan about the
current checklist or sharing an updated spreadsheet, you can find him going to
the zoo with his kids, cleaning up their playroom, and rockn’ out to some Bon
Jovi.

### Chad DeBouche

CIO of Deep Learning Rental Outside of his busy daily work schedule, he gets
to spend even more time being a Dance Dad to his daughter.
